cosineInterpolatedNoise(float, float) - Method in class heroesgrave.utils.math.Perlin
Deprecated.
Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
based on the cosine-interpolated value of random fractional corner values.

Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.
